Disease.Name: EPILEPSY, IDIOPATHIC GENERALIZED, SUSCEPTIBILITY TO, 10 (EIG10)
Disease.Synonym: GENERALIZED EPILEPSY WITH FEBRILE SEIZURES PLUS, TYPE 5, SUSCEPTIBILITY TO, INCLUDED; GEFS5, INCLUDED
Disease.Summary: rare;autosomal recessive;variation in the GABRD gene

literature.title: A structural look at GABAA receptor mutations linked to epilepsy syndromes
literature.author: Hernandez CC,

literature.title: GABRD encoding a protein for extra- or peri-synaptic GABAA receptors is a susceptibility locus for generalized epilepsies
literature.author: Dibbens LM,
